aimod-debug.description: Always send a detailed AI moderation debug message to the AI violations channel, including flagged messages, AI decision, and applied actions.

nsfw-verbose.description: Post a detailed scan report embed in the same channel as the scanned media.

nsfw-channel.description: Channel where NSFW violations are logged with a preview of the media.

nsfw-channel-notify.description: Send a notification embed to the channel when NSFW content is removed.

nsfw-enabled.description: Enable NSFW scanning for messages, reactions, and avatars (other toggles still apply).

monitor-events.description: Enable/disable logging for each type of monitored event.

locale.description: Override automatic locale detection with a specific locale code.

nsfw-detection-action.description: Action to take when a user posts NSFW content.

nsfw-high-accuracy.description: Enable high-accuracy NSFW scans for more reliable detection. Accelerated only.

threshold.description: Threshold for NSFW detection confidence. Lower values are more sensitive.

banned-words-action.description: Action to take when a user posts a banned word.

monitor-channel.description: Channel to log all server activities, including message edits, deletions, and user join/leave events.

captcha-log-channel.description: Channel where captcha verification logs and activity updates are posted.

aimod-channel.description: Channel where AI violation logs are posted.

cycle-strike-actions.description: Cycle through strike actions when run out of actions to give a user.

exclude-bannedwords-channels.description: Channels to exclude from banned words detection.

strike-actions.description: Actions to take for each strike level.

strike-expiry.description: Time a strike lasts for. Use formats like 20s, 30m, 2h, 30d, 2w, 5mo, 1y. Seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months and years respectively.

dm-on-strike.description: DM the user when they receive a strike.

check-pfp.description: Check the profile picture of the user for NSFW content.

nsfw-pfp-action.description: Action to take when a user sets an NSFW profile picture.

nsfw-pfp-message.description: The message to send when a player has had their profile picture flagged.
nsfw-pfp-message.default: Your profile picture was detected to contain explicit content
choices: Your profile picture was detected to contain explicit content
Your profile picture is not appropriate for this server.
Your profile picture has been flagged as NSFW.

unmute-on-safe-pfp.description: Remove timeout of a user once they have changed their profile picture to something appropriate.

scan-age-restricted.description: Scan age-restricted (NSFW) channels. When off, NSFW channels are skipped.

check-tenor-gifs.description: Apply punishments when NSFW content is detected in Tenor GIFs.

use-default-banned-words.description: Use the built-in profanity list for this server.

delete-scam-messages.description: Automatically delete messages that match scam patterns or URLs.

scam-detection-action.description: Action to take when a scam message is detected.

check-links.description: Check links in messages for malware, phishing, scamming etc.

exclude-scam-channels.description: Channels to exclude from scam detection.

rules.description: The server rules used for autonomous moderation.
default: 1. Be respectful â€” no harassment or hate speech.

aimod-detection-action.description: Action to take when the autonomous moderator detects a violation. Use auto for the AI to make the decision.

aimod-high-accuracy.description: Use higher-accuracy AI moderation with gpt-5-mini (approx. 2.25 USD per 1M tokens). Consumes the monthly budget faster compared to the default.

autonomous-mod.description: Use AI to automatically moderate your entire server.

aimod-check-interval.description: How often to run the AI moderation batch process.

aimod-mode.description: Choose how AI moderation is triggered: `report` mode (only on mention), `interval` mode (automatic background scanning), or `adaptive` mode (dynamically switches based on server activity, events, or configuration).

aimod-adaptive-events.description: Configure which events trigger switching AI moderation modes.

no-forward-from-role.description: Stop a specific role from forwarding messages.

banned-urls.description: Exact URLs or domains to block.

url-detection-action.description: Action to take when a blocked URL is detected.

exclude-url-channels.description: Channels to exclude from banned URLs.

vcmod-enabled.description: Enable voice channel moderation and transcription.

vcmod-channels.description: Voice channels to monitor (when empty, none are monitored).

vcmod-listen-duration.description: How long to actively listen per voice channel during a cycle (e.g., 2m, 5m).

vcmod-idle-duration.description: How long to pause between each transcription in Saver Mode.

vcmod-saver-mode.description: Saver mode: bot cycles through VCs to appear active but does not record or listen most of the time.

vcmod-rules.description: Rules applied to voice chat moderation (separate from text rules).
default: 1. No harassment, hate speech, or threats.
3. No incitement to violence or illegal activity.
4. No sexual content or explicit remarks.

vcmod-detection-action.description: Action to take when VC moderation detects a violation. Use auto for the AI to decide.

vcmod-high-accuracy.description: Use higher-accuracy AI analysis for VC moderation (uses more token budget).

vcmod-high-quality-transcription.description: Enable clearer voice transcripts with premium processing (higher cost).

vcmod-transcript-channel.description: Channel where VC transcripts are posted.

vcmod-transcript-only.description: When enabled, the bot will only transcribe voice chat without applying AI rule checks or moderation actions. This significantly reduces budget usage.

captcha-verification-enabled.description: Require newcomers to pass a captcha challenge before they gain access.

captcha-grace-period.description: How long newcomers have to finish captcha verification (e.g. 10m, 1h).

captcha-success-actions.description: Actions performed automatically after successful verification.

captcha-delivery-method.description: How captcha verification links are delivered to new members (DM or embed).

captcha-embed-channel-id.description: Channel where the captcha verification embed is posted when using embed delivery.

pre-captcha-roles.description: Roles assigned to newcomers before they complete captcha verification.

captcha-failure-actions.description: Actions to perform automatically when a member fails captcha verification.

vpn-detection-enabled.description: Enable VPN and proxy screening during verification.

vpn-detection-actions.description: Actions to perform automatically when VPN detection denies access.

vpn-pre-actions.description: Role adjustments applied before VPN screening.

vpn-post-actions.description: Role adjustments applied after successful VPN screening.

nsfw_pfp_message.default: Your profile picture was detected to contain explicit content
choices: Your profile picture was detected to contain explicit content
Your profile picture is not appropriate for this server.
Your profile picture has been flagged as NSFW.

default: 1. No harassment, hate speech, or threats.
3. No incitement to violence or illegal activity.
4. No sexual content or explicit remarks.
